author: pipermerriam
content: Curious if anyone wants to make a case for libp2p or devp2p?

author: pipermerriam
content: Libp2p embraces eth2 ecosystem at the first of increased friction for adoption by existing eth1 clients. Devp2p seems to invert this, embracing ease of adoption by eth1 clients and making it more  difficult for eth2 infra to integrate
